sentence: Senate Democrats like Raphael Warnock, Mark Kelly, Catherine Cortez Masto, Michael Bennet, and Maggie Hassan have done nothing but rubber stamp Joe Biden’s disastrous agenda that’s hurting American families.

title: Florida reacts to Joe Biden’s State of the Union address

sentence: The Democrats who voted to rid of the mask mandate are: the senators from Nevada, Jacky Rosen and Catherine Cortez Masto; the senators from Arizona, Mark Kelly and Kyrsten Sinema; Michael Bennet of Colorado, Joe Manchin of West Virginia, Maggie Hassan of New Hampshire and Jon Tester of Montana.

title: Senate votes to repeal travel mask mandates in bipartisan rebuke of Biden administration policy

title: REPORT: White House threatens veto of Rand Paul legislation which just passed in Senate with bipartisan support
